name: Meta4
overview:
Meta4 NV designs, develops, and markets human resource and intellectual capital management and development solutions. The companyâ€™s suites enable workforce acquisition and development, remuneration management, time management, document management, and human resource placement and management services. Additionally, it provides government and public administration and human resource outsourcing solutions. Meta4 markets its products under the PeopleNet brand name. Its clientele include Agapes Restauration, Almacenes ParÃ­s, Caprabo, Farmacias Cruz Verde, Grupo JerÃ³nimo Martins, Aguas de Barcelona, GasNor, Autoroute du Sud de le France, Atento Telecomunicaciones, Jarvis Hotels, Banco de el Salvador, Banco Estado, Danone, Delphi, BST Consulting Group, Emergia, Institut Catholique de Lille, McKesson, and Somos Pessoas. The company partners with BST Consulting Group, DDAS, SG Group, EDS, Haberconf & Asociados, HUMAN GLOBAL SOLUTIONS, Hewitt Associates, McKesson Corporation, and Ernst & Young.

Meta4 NV was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Las Rozas, Spain with additional operations in France, Portugal, the United States, Mexico, Argentina, Brazil, Chile, and Peru.
